text: Born Rich is a 1924 American silent comedy film directed by William Nigh and written by Harriete Underhill and Walter DeLeon. It is based on the 1924 novel Born Rich by Hughes Cornell. The film stars Claire Windsor, Bert Lytell, Cullen Landis, Doris Kenyon, Frank Morgan, and J. Barney Sherry. The film was released on December 7, 1924, by First National Pictures. ==Cast== ==Preservation== A copy of Born Rich is maintained at the Deutsche Kinemathek in Berlin.Library of Congress American Silent Feature Film Survival Database: Born Rich ==References== ==External links== * * *Stills and advertisements at the Claire Windsor website *Still at silenthollywood.com Category:1924 films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:American comedy films Category:1924 comedy films Category:First National Pictures films Category:Films directed by William Nigh Category:American silent feature films Category:American black-and-white films
title: Born Rich (1924 film)
